EmailTemplate.subject: Kindergarten Open Morning: thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for coming along to our Kindergarten Open Morning!. We hope you found the morning fun and informative and {!Lead.Creche_no__c} enjoyed the day.
We are very excited that {!Lead.Creche_no__c} is starting with us in Kindergarten next year! We will be in touch to invite {!Lead.Creche_no__c} to our Kindergarten Orientation on Wednesday 12 November from 9.00am to 12noon. There will also be a parents morning tea and information session on the day from 11.00am.
In the meantime, to keep up to date with what’s happening across our K-12 St Andrew’s community, visit our facebook page. It’s updated daily during term time with news, photos, events and mini videos.
If you have any further questions regarding {!Lead.Creche_no__c} starting Kindergarten next year, please let us know.
Regards
Robyn Pedley
Enrolments Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
